attributes.action: make landlords responsible for private tenants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
change the law so that private lanlords can be prosecuted. This is so that when they have tenants which are proven to cause a nusience and/or distrupt the neigbourhood. and to which the landlord has placed them. 
At present there is no curent legislation to combat this epidemic which is seeing tenants who have been 'kicked off' council housing to freely get onto private housing and continue their reign of disruption/terror, and no law can  evict them, unless we change it!!!!
